overview:
Haley-O is a blogger, freelance writer, editor, Director of Membership and Community at the discount shopping website for moms and moms-to-be â€” bTrendie.com.

She is probably most famous for her posts on pre-partum depression, OCD and anxiety (aka prenatal or pregnancy depression) â€” and other less important things that she wishes werenâ€™t googled so often.

Her blog www.cheatymonkey.com was one of five finalists in the 2009 Bloggies for Best Canadian Blog. She also has a kitchen blog (cheatykitchen.com), and she is a contributor for Canada Moms Blog (www.canadamomsblog.com).

Haley also sells Canadian art at her website Kids Deserve Art (www.kidsdeserveart.com).
